'''Grainfruit Meat Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Grainfruit Meat Soup is obtainable from [[Chanca]] at [[Zakan's Street Bites]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Grainfruit Meat Soup restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
